{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DAP-1160 |revision=A1 |upc=790069303401 |ean= |asin=B000VS08QC |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/12/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=KA2AP1160A1 |ic_id=4216A-AP1160 |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, (38400,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8201CP |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux; 2.4.18-MIPS-01.00 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.50 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:1E:58 |oui_eth=00:1E:58 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless G Access Point''
[http://www.dlink.co.uk/cs/Satellite?c=Product_C&cid=1197319181026&packedargs=locale%3D1195806691854&pagename=DLinkEurope-GB%2FDLWrapper&childpagename=DLinkEurope-GB/DLProductCarouselMultiple&p=1197318962342&packedargs=TopLevelPageProduct%3DHome%26packedargs%3DProductParentID%253D1195808621247 Product page (UK)] [https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/DLinkDAP1160A1PL Pictures] Listed on [http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Realtek_SOC#Realtek_RTL8180 Realtek SOC page on linux-mips.org] as having 4MB Flash and 16MB RAM. {{WiFiCert|WFA4957|02/15/2007}} ==JTAG== Located at J2 To make JTAG work, R68 should be added. ==UART== Located at J1 : [Vcc|TX|RX|GND] Baudrate 38400 8M1 ==Images== File:D-Link DAP-1160.jpg|the unit [[Has images::external| ]] File:D-link dap-1160a1-top.jpeg File:D-link dap-1160a1-bottom.jpeg [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Logs==
